channel.title: Update doesn't allow people on?
channel.description: Well the command ::update (time in seconds) make the update thing in yellow on bottom left of screen appear and count down once it hits 0 everyone is kicked. I like this because the players get excited that there is an update. But while the update is running no one can log on. Can anyone fix this?

item.title: Update doesn't allow people on?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Well the command ::update (time in seconds) make the update thing in yellow on bottom left of screen appear and count down once it hits 0 everyone is kicked. I like this because the players get excited that there is an update. But while the update is running no one can log on. Can anyone fix this?
